column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////When it comes to Chicago style pizza
column2: Lou's is the best. The Chicago Classic is my personal favorite. The sausage they use is just wonderful. Then the sauce is what really makes it. The vine-ripened tomato sauce is the best pizza sauce I've ever had. There appetizers are worth it as well. I'm a fan of the hot wings and bruschetta. When in Chicago make sure you stop by this historic pizza joint!
